title: ALL SOLD: T206 Raw HOf Cards

posts.post_title: ALL SOLD: T206 Raw HOf Cards
posts.post_content:
SOLD - Tinker (Piedmont 350-460) - sharp card, no issues, $250
SOLD - Chance (Polar Bear) - shows some light ghosting on front, $250
SOLD - Jennings (Sweet Cap 350-460) - diagonal scratch on front, upper right, $60

All prices are net delivered, PayPal preferred, but will accept other forms of payment. Take all three for $500.
